mapper.insert: insert into users (user_id, user_pwd, user_email, user_birthday) values (#{userId}, #{userPwd}, #{userEmail}, #{userBirthday})
mapper.select: select user_id, user_pwd, user_email, user_birthday, user_coupon, user_point from users where user_id=#{userId}
select count(user_id) from users where user_id=#{userId}
